context: You're taking the first step towards starting a family 🌟
explanation: Intrauterine Insemination (IUI) is a fertility treatment where sperm is directly placed in the uterus. We'll discuss your medical history, ovarian reserve, and the best time for IUI 📆
next_steps: We'll schedule an ultrasound to monitor follicle growth and time the IUI procedure 📊
reassurance: Don't worry, we're here to support you throughout this journey 🌈
call_to_action: Please arrive 15 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment time ⏰

explanation: During the IUI procedure, [PAUSE] sperm is inserted directly into the uterus, [EMPATHY] and we'll discuss the best timing based on your menstrual cycle and ovulation
next_steps: We'll schedule an ultrasound to monitor follicle growth, [GENTLE TONE] and then we'll proceed with the IUI procedure
reassurance: You're not alone in this journey, [EMPATHY] and we're committed to supporting you every step of the way

context: You're getting close to your IUI procedure! 📆
explanation: Your trigger shot is scheduled for today. This shot will help your eggs mature and get ready for the IUI procedure. You'll receive a dose of hCG (human chorionic gonadotropin) to stimulate ovulation. 🌟
next_steps: Please come to our clinic today at the scheduled time for the trigger shot. After the shot, you'll need to wait 34-40 hours before the IUI procedure. 🕒
reassurance: Don't worry, our team is here to support you throughout this process. You're doing great, and we're excited for your IUI procedure! 🤞
call_to_action: Arrive at the clinic at least 15 minutes before your scheduled time. If you have any questions, feel free to WhatsApp us! 📲

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, [PAUSE] I hope you're doing well today. [EMPATHY]

next_steps: Please arrive at our clinic today at the scheduled time, [GENTLE TONE] and our team will take care of the rest. After the shot, you'll need to wait 34-40 hours before the IUI procedure, [PAUSE] so we'll schedule that accordingly.

context: Your IUI procedure is scheduled for today.
explanation: Please arrive at the clinic 30 minutes prior to your scheduled time. You will need to provide a semen sample, which will be washed and prepared for the procedure. The IUI process typically takes about 15-20 minutes, and you may experience mild cramping.
next_steps: After the procedure, you will need to rest for 30 minutes before leaving the clinic. You can resume normal activities, but avoid heavy lifting or strenuous exercise for the next 24 hours.
reassurance: Don't worry, our team is here to support you throughout the process. We understand this can be a nerve-wracking time, but we're here to help you every step of the way 🌟
call_to_action: If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're just a WhatsApp away! 📲

We will need a semen sample from your partner, which will be washed and prepared for the procedure. The IUI process itself is relatively quick, about 15-20 minutes, and you may experience some mild cramping.

context: You've completed your IUI procedure and now it's time to wait 📆
explanation: Over the next two weeks, your body will be preparing for a potential pregnancy. You might experience some symptoms like mood swings, breast tenderness, or mild cramping - these are all normal 🙏
next_steps: Take a pregnancy test 14 days after IUI. If it's positive, schedule a follow-up appointment with us 📅
reassurance: Try to relax and stay positive during this time 🙏. We're here to support you, and we'll guide you through the next steps 🤗
call_to_action: Reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns 📲

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, [PAUSE] this is a call from the clinic. How are you doing today? [EMPATHY]
context: I wanted to follow up with you regarding your recent IUI procedure [GENTLE TONE]. You're now in the two-week waiting period
explanation: During this time, your body will be adjusting to the procedure, and you might experience some symptoms such as mood swings or breast tenderness [EMPATHY]. These are completely normal and usually subside on their own
next_steps: We recommend taking a pregnancy test 14 days after the IUI [PAUSE]. If the test is positive, please schedule a follow-up appointment with us to confirm the pregnancy and discuss next steps
reassurance: I know this can be a stressful and emotional time [EMPATHY], but please try to relax and stay positive. We're here to support you throughout this journey [GENTLE TONE]
call_to_action: If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out to us [PAUSE]. We're always here to help

context: We have your IUI beta hCG test results.
explanation: Your hCG level is {{hcg_level}} mIU/mL, indicating a positive pregnancy test! This is a great start. You underwent IUI {{days_since_iui}} days ago.
next_steps: Schedule a follow-up appointment with Dr. {{doctor_name}} in 2 weeks for a viability scan to confirm a healthy pregnancy.
reassurance: Congratulations! This is wonderful news. We're thrilled for you 🙏
call_to_action: Book your follow-up scan by calling {{clinic_phone}} or replying to this message.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, [PAUSE] this is [Your Name] from the clinic.

explanation: [EMPATHY] I know how anxious you must be, but I'm delighted to inform you that your hCG level is {{hcg_level}} mIU/mL, which indicates a positive pregnancy test. [GENTLE TONE] This is a great start, considering you underwent IUI {{days_since_iui}} days ago.
next_steps: [GENTLE TONE] We would like to schedule a follow-up appointment with Dr. {{doctor_name}} in about two weeks for a viability scan to confirm a healthy pregnancy.
reassurance: [EMPATHY] I completely understand this is a life-changing moment for you. [PAUSE] We're all very happy for you, and we're here to support you throughout this journey.
call_to_action: [GENTLE TONE] To book your follow-up scan, please call us back at {{clinic_phone}} at your earliest convenience.

context: We've received your beta hCG test results.
explanation: Unfortunately, the results show that the hCG levels are not detectable, indicating that the IUI cycle was not successful this time. 🙏
next_steps: We recommend discussing next steps with Dr. {{doctor_name}} to explore further options, such as another IUI cycle or considering other fertility treatments like IVF.
reassurance: Please know that this is not uncommon, and many couples experience a negative result before achieving a successful pregnancy. You're not alone in this journey! 💕
call_to_action: Let's schedule a follow-up consultation to discuss the next steps. Reply to this message or call us at {{clinic_phone}}.

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, [PAUSE] I'm so sorry to inform you that your beta hCG test results are in, [EMPATHY] and unfortunately, they're not what we were hoping for.
context: The test shows that the hCG levels are not detectable, [GENTLE TONE] which means that the IUI cycle was not successful this time.
explanation: I know this can be disappointing news, [EMPATHY] but please know that this is a common outcome, and many couples experience a negative result before achieving a successful pregnancy. [PAUSE] We can discuss next steps and explore further options, such as another IUI cycle or considering other fertility treatments like IVF.
next_steps: Let's schedule a follow-up consultation with Dr. {{doctor_name}} to discuss the next steps, [GENTLE TONE] and we'll work together to find the best course of action for you.
reassurance: You're not alone in this journey, [EMPATHY] and we're here to support you every step of the way. [PAUSE] Remember, this is not a reflection of your ability to become a parent, and we'll do everything we can to help you achieve your dream of having a child.
call_to_action: Shall we schedule a follow-up consultation at your earliest convenience? You can reach us at {{clinic_phone}}.

context: You're considering your options for fertility treatment and we're here to support you 🤝
explanation: IUI (Intrauterine Insemination) and IVF (In Vitro Fertilization) are both viable options, but they have different success rates and requirements 📊. IUI is less invasive and less expensive, but it may take several attempts to achieve pregnancy 🤞. IVF, on the other hand, has a higher success rate, but it's more invasive and expensive 📈
next_steps: We recommend discussing your options with Dr. {{doctor_name}} to determine the best course of treatment for you 📅
reassurance: We understand that this can be a difficult and emotional decision, but we're here to support you every step of the way 🌈
call_to_action: Reply to this message or call us at {{clinic_phone}} to schedule a consultation with Dr. {{doctor_name}} 📞

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, [PAUSE] I hope you're doing well today [EMPATHY]
context: I understand that you're considering your options for fertility treatment and I'm here to support you [GENTLE TONE]
explanation: Let me explain the difference between IUI and IVF [PAUSE]. IUI, or Intrauterine Insemination, is a less invasive procedure where sperm is inserted directly into the uterus [EMPATHY]. IVF, or In Vitro Fertilization, is a more invasive procedure where the egg is fertilized outside the body and then transferred to the uterus [GENTLE TONE]
next_steps: I recommend that you discuss your options with Dr. {{doctor_name}} to determine the best course of treatment for you [PAUSE]
reassurance: I know that this can be a difficult and emotional decision, but please know that we're here to support you every step of the way [EMPATHY]
call_to_action: Can I schedule a consultation for you with Dr. {{doctor_name}} at your earliest convenience [GENTLE TONE]?

context: You're in the Two Week Wait (TWW) after IUI - the waiting period before pregnancy test.
explanation: For the next 14 days, your body will decide if the sperm met egg and implanted. Beta hCG test scheduled {{beta_date}}. During TWW: Take progesterone support (if prescribed), Rest (no heavy exercise), Watch for implantation bleeding (light spotting Day 6-12 normal).
next_steps: Continue medications EXACTLY as prescribed. Avoid: Sex, hot baths, alcohol, smoking. Normal activities okay - bed rest doesn't improve success!
reassurance: TWW is hardest part - anxiety normal! Try to stay busy, avoid symptom-spotting (progesterone causes same symptoms as pregnancy). We're hopeful! 🌟
call_to_action: Beta test {{beta_date}} - DON'T take home pregnancy test before (can be false negative). Questions? WhatsApp anytime!

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, it's Nurse {{nurse_name}}. How are you feeling after the procedure?
context: [GENTLE TONE] You're now in what we call the Two Week Wait - the time between IUI and your pregnancy test.
explanation: For the next 14 days, implantation may or may not happen - it's completely out of our hands now. [PAUSE] Your beta hCG test is scheduled for {{beta_date}}. During this time, you'll continue taking progesterone if prescribed. You may notice light spotting around Day 6-12 - that can be implantation bleeding, which is actually a good sign. [EMPATHY] But it's also normal to have no symptoms.
next_steps: Keep taking all medications exactly as prescribed - don't skip doses. [CLEAR] Avoid intercourse, hot baths, alcohol, and smoking. But you can do normal daily activities - bed rest doesn't improve success rates, so don't feel you need to lie in bed for two weeks.
reassurance: [EMPATHY] I know the wait is incredibly hard. Many patients say this is the worst part - the not knowing. Try to keep yourself busy. [GENTLE TONE] Avoid Googling symptoms or taking home pregnancy tests too early - they can give false results and just increase anxiety.
call_to_action: Come in for your beta test on {{beta_date}}. That's the only way to know for sure. [PAUSE] And please, call us if you have severe pain, heavy bleeding, or fever - those need immediate attention.
contact_info: You can reach me or Dr. {{doctor_name}} anytime at {{clinic_phone}}.

context: Your beta hCG test is POSITIVE - you're pregnant!
explanation: hCG level: {{beta_value}} mIU/mL (Positive = >5, yours is GREAT for {{days_post_iui}} days post-IUI!). This confirms successful implantation! IUI success rate is 10-20% per cycle, and YOU DID IT! 🌟
next_steps: Repeat beta in 48 hours ({{next_beta_date}}) - should double. Continue ALL medications (progesterone critical!). First ultrasound at 6 weeks. NO sex, heavy lifting.
reassurance: This is REAL! Early pregnancy is fragile - some spotting normal, but report heavy bleeding. Most IUI pregnancies proceed normally to healthy baby! 💚
call_to_action: CELEBRATE but stay cautious! Keep taking meds. Come for repeat beta {{next_beta_date}}. Any bleeding/cramping? Call immediately!

greeting: {{patient_name}}, it's Dr. {{doctor_name}}. [PAUSE] I have wonderful news for you.
context: [WARM TONE] Your beta hCG test came back positive - you're pregnant!
explanation: Your hCG level is {{beta_value}}, which is a really good number for {{days_post_iui}} days after the IUI procedure. [PAUSE] This means the sperm successfully fertilized the egg and it implanted in your uterus. [EMPATHY] I know you've been waiting for this moment.
next_steps: [CLEAR] Here's what happens next: You'll need to come back in 48 hours for a repeat beta test on {{next_beta_date}}. We expect the number to roughly double - that's how we confirm the pregnancy is progressing well. Keep taking ALL your medications, especially progesterone - don't stop anything yet. Your first ultrasound will be around 6 weeks to confirm the heartbeat.
reassurance: [GENTLE TONE] I'm thrilled for you, but I also want to set realistic expectations. Early pregnancy is a sensitive time. Some light spotting is normal, but if you have heavy bleeding or severe cramping, call us right away. [PAUSE] The vast majority of IUI pregnancies that start with good beta numbers like yours go on to be healthy babies.
call_to_action: For now: celebrate this milestone, but take it easy. No sex, no heavy lifting. Keep taking your medications religiously. And come see us for that repeat beta.
contact_info: [WARM] Congratulations again. Call me anytime at {{clinic_phone}} if you have any concerns.

greeting: {{patient_name}}, it's Dr. {{doctor_name}}. Do you have a moment to talk?
context: [GENTLE TONE] I'm calling with your beta hCG results, and [PAUSE] I'm sorry to tell you the test was negative.
explanation: Your hCG level was {{beta_value}}, which is below the threshold for pregnancy (we need >5). [EMPATHY] This means the IUI cycle didn't result in pregnancy this time. I know this isn't the news you were hoping for, and I'm truly sorry.
next_steps: [CLEAR] You can stop taking progesterone and any other medications. Your period should start within the next week. [PAUSE] When it does, call us on Day 1 if you want to try another IUI cycle. There's no required waiting period - you can start right away if you're ready.
reassurance: [EMPATHY] I know this is devastating. [PAUSE] But please don't lose hope - the success rate for IUI is 10-20% per cycle, which means most people need 3-4 attempts. Your body responded well to the medications (good follicle count: {{follicle_count}}), so there's no reason to think it won't work next time. Some people just need multiple tries.
call_to_action: Take time to grieve this loss - it's real, even though the pregnancy never developed. [GENTLE TONE] When you're ready, we can discuss next steps: try IUI again, adjust medications, or consider moving to IVF if you've had multiple failed IUIs. No pressure - take the time you need.
contact_info: [EMPATHY] I'm here if you want to talk. Call me anytime at {{clinic_phone}}. I'm so sorry.

context: You've tried {{iui_attempts}} IUI cycle(s) without success - considering IVF?
explanation: IUI success: 10-20% per cycle. After {{iui_attempts}} failures, cumulative odds dropping. IVF success: 40-60% per cycle (much higher!). IVF better if: Age >35, Low sperm count, Blocked tubes, Endometriosis, >3-4 failed IUIs. IUI cheaper (₹15-20K) but lower success. IVF expensive (₹1.5-2L) but higher success = fewer cycles needed.
next_steps: Options: 1) Try 1-2 more IUI cycles (if young + no other issues). 2) Move to IVF now (recommended if >35 or other factors). 3) Take break, decide later. Consult with Dr. {{doctor_name}} to review case.
reassurance: Failed IUIs don't mean you can't get pregnant! IVF gives more control - we retrieve eggs, see fertilization, pick best embryos. Many IUI failures succeed with IVF! 💪
call_to_action: Schedule IVF consultation to discuss costs, timeline, success odds for YOUR case. No obligation - just information!

greeting: {{patient_name}}, thank you for coming in. I wanted to have an honest conversation with you about next steps.
context: [EMPATHETIC] You've completed {{iui_attempts}} IUI cycles without success. I know that's been really hard.
explanation: [CLEAR] Let me explain the statistics. IUI has about a 10-20% success rate per cycle. After {{iui_attempts}} attempts, the cumulative odds of it working are actually declining. [PAUSE] IVF, on the other hand, has a 40-60% success rate per cycle depending on age and other factors. It's significantly higher. [HONEST] Now, IVF costs more - around ₹1.5-2 lakhs per cycle versus ₹15-20K for IUI. But if you need 6 IUI cycles to get the same chance as 2 IVF cycles, the math actually favors IVF in the long run.
next_steps: [OPTIONS] Here are your choices: First, you could try 1-2 more IUI cycles if you're under 35 and there are no other issues - some people do succeed on attempt 4 or 5. Second, you could move to IVF now, which is what I'd recommend if you're over 35, have low sperm parameters, or have tried IUI 3+ times. Third, you could take a break and decide later - there's no rush if you need time emotionally or financially.
reassurance: [EMPATHY] Failed IUIs absolutely do not mean you can't get pregnant. IVF gives us much more control - we can see the eggs, watch them fertilize, choose the best embryos, and place them directly in the uterus. Many patients who fail IUI succeed on their first or second IVF cycle. You're not a failure - sometimes the method just needs to be more aggressive.
call_to_action: I'd like to schedule an IVF consultation for you - no obligation, just to give you all the information about costs, timeline, and your specific success odds. Then you can make an informed decision. Does that sound okay?
contact_info: Think it over and call me at {{clinic_phone}} when you're ready to talk more.
